Princess Fragrance knew that there would be no way for her to be able to defeat Cat Noir and Ladybug together, even with her newly discovered powers. She needed to isolate one of them from the other, then they could become her slaves. She figured she should go after Ladybug first, after all she was the stronger of the two heroes and the one who defeated her last time.
         Unfortunately for her, while trying to come up with a plan to isolate one from the other, the two of them managed to track her down.
         "Looks like we found you Princess Fragrance! Good thing we found you before you could enslave any more people." said Ladybug.
         Shit why did they have to show up now! thought Princess Fragrance as she ran away from the two heroes who gave chase.I have to figure out how to separate them! If I lose them, I could come up with a way to do so. Despite her gurgling stomach, Princess Fragrance managed to take a turn down the alley and managed to open up a manhole cover and escaped into the sewer. Listening above she hears the heroes come up with a plan to find her.
         "Where did she go!" asked Ladybug.
         "I don't know M' lady, but it looks like we have this alley to ourselves now. Maybe a kiss for good luck will help us find her!" Cat Noir says flirtaciously.
         "Cat Noir be serious! Let's split up to search for her, You go ahead to see if you can find her there, I'll go back to see if she managed to sneak back that way."
         "Aye aye!"
         Princess Fragrance couldn't believe her luck. She was worried about how to separate the duo, and they did it themselves. Now all she had to do was sneak attack Ladybug, and she'd win. She got out of the sewer and began to slowly tiptoe behind Ladybug, waiting for the opportunity to strike. She managed to get closer, and closer, but then Ladybug turned around unexpectedly and saw Princess Fragrance trying to sneak up on her. One quick flick of her yo-yo was all it took to tie Princess Fragrance up. All Ladybug had to do to win would be to break the akuma in the gun. The gun! I still have it holstered by my waist! If I can fart on her before she reaches it, then I can win.
         Ladybug thought she was going to win so she took a bit of time to taunt Princess Fragrance. "Wow, you almost had me there, almost! looks like I didn't even need my lucky charm to defeat you!" Ladybug says bending down to reach for the gun. As she bends down and kneels to grab the gun from it's holster Princess Fragrance springs her little trap. A pink cloud bursts from her ass and surrounds Ladybug who has no choice but to breathe it in. Her eyes turn pink as her mind vanishes leaving behind one last thought, "At your service Princess Fragrance!"
         Princess Fragrance squealed with delight as she heard that her plan had worked. Then she got to ordering around her new slave. "First of all, is this any way to treat a princess? Untie me at once!" Ladybug of course had no choice but to comply. "Now give me your earrings!"

1211.content:
Ladybug was running herself ragged recently. Ever since the Akumas first appeared, crime rates in Paris were escalating. With how helpless the police were in combating these threats, street-level criminals figured that they could get away with more. They also believed that the ones who actually dealt with those supervillains would be too busy to bother interfering with lesser law breakers. Such as the case with this thug, who was driving a large semi-truck through the road. Up to this point, she had successfully evaded conventional authorities, but her pursuer was capable of keeping up with her. The constant thwarting of various illegal activities had left the mystical superheroine with low stamina reserves, yet she was still determined to take down this crook. Although, having a bit of help would not hurt; where was Chat Noir?

“You won’t catch me, Ladybitch!” The driver yelled.

LB growled at the comment at continued her pursuit, swinging through the streets with her magic yo-yo. In time, she caught up to the giant black vehicle, and landed on the top of the trailer. The sound of her impacting the metal alerted the driver to her presence, so the criminal grabbed a gun and popped her head out the window to try and shoot Ladybug. LB got a quick look at the woman. She had short brown hair in a bob cut, black irises, and tan skin. Her attire was composed of only a dark gray, short-sleeved shirt as far as the teenager could tell. The lady pulled the trigger, firing a bullet that just missed the side of Ladybug’s head. A few more shots were fired, but none of them were even close to hitting her. The goon kept at it, unaware that the truck was currently swerving out of control.

“Watch the road!” Ladybug warned.

The criminal turned her head to the front of the truck, only to see that it was heading straight for a building. She tried cranking the steering wheel to avoid a collision, but the automobile was moving too fast. Ladybug jumped off of the trailer, landing on the street behind the truck. The truck itself crashed into the building, creating a massive hole in the structure. Ladybug sprinted toward the totaled vehicle, but stopped when she saw what was in the trailer. The backdoor was broken off of its hinges by the crash, and it revealed a group of bloodied boys. The mystical superheroine slowly approached the people in the trailer, seeing that the people inside were all children, none looked over 12 years old. She got a closer look and had to active suppress the urge to vomit as she saw that children were all critically injured; some had their appendages broken, others suffered cracked skulls, and Ladybug could even see the ivory bones jutting out of their bodies.

“Wh-why..?” LB whispered.

Her thoughts were interrupted by an exhausted grunt, coming from the front of the truck. With greater agility than an Olympian, Ladybug leaped over to the left side of the truck, seeing the woman pull herself out of the wreckage. She was injured as well, though surprisingly not to the extent of her cargo. There were scarlet cuts and black bruises all over her face, her clothes were tattered except for the part that covered her breasts. She was shocked to see Ladybug in front of her, and that shock increased when the woman was yanked from the automobile by her.

“Why were those people in the truck?”

The woman, who had a nametag on her chest that read ‘Linda’, heard the anger in the heroine’s voice. “I’m a human trafficker. Those brats were supposed to be shipped off to a wealthy businesswoman with an ‘attraction’ to younger men. Thanks to you, my employer won’t be getting her toys.”

Ladybug’s eyes widened in disgust. Every dark thought in her mind was begging her to punish this woman. The teenager tried hard to fight those urges. Even though this woman was engaging in a horrible crime, she must not respond with such negative emotions, for it could draw the attention of Hawkmoth’s Akumas. In spite of the situation, Linda couldn’t help but smirk at her distraught.

“You know, before they were loaded into the truck, I had some fun with them too.” Linda taunted. “They didn’t like it at first, but soon they were enjoying it as much as I was.”

That was the straw that broke the camel’s back.

Ladybug was now beyond pissed. If there were any reservations about brutally punishing this woman, they were gone. All that mattered was making this bitch suffer, but the question was how. A multitude of different forms of retributions were running through her mind, but they were interrupted by LB’s grumbling stomach. Constant patrols across Paris left less time for eating. Then, an interesting idea popped into her head. She licked her lips, to the confusion of Linda, and opened her mouth. At first, Ladybug’s mouth stopped for a bit, but after a few seconds a popping sound signified that her jaw has unhinged, allowing her to stretch her mouth to inhuman levels. Now, Linda’s eyes widened and before she can curse or scream, her head was shoved into the girl’s maw. Ladybug tuned out the criminals muffled shouts because she was too enamored by her flavor.

“Oh my God!” The school student exclaimed in her head. “This taste is amazing!”

Ladybug let out a pleasurable moan as she savored her prey, forcing more of Linda’s body into her mouth. Now, the brunette’s head was resting in Ladybug’s belly, after enduring a slimy trip through her dark pink throat. Ladybug’s tongue was licking Linda’s bare stomach, getting a few giggles from the still scared woman, before gulping down that section of her body. While this is going on, Ladybug’s stomach has expanded quite a bit, though her magic suit’s fabric does not rip from it. In a matter of minutes, Linda’s legs were currently dangling from Ladybug’s mouth, before they were slurped up like wet noodles. Having finished her unusual meal, Ladybug took a minute to catch her breath. She gasped when she saw her giant squirming gut, but the shock was soon replaced by a new sense of pleasure. Her food’s violent struggle felt like a soothing massage to her, but it did stir up some gas. That gas momentarily ballooned her belly before ascending through her esophagus and being belched out.

~*BBBBBBBBBBEEEEEELLLLCCCCCCHHHH!*~

Ladybug’s crass burp rang out across the streets, carrying a scent of cookies, cakes, and currently digesting human being. A now blushing LB covered her mouth and excused herself, glad that the truck prevented anyone from entering the alley she was in. The teenage crime-fighter decided to flee the scene and make her way back home, not wanting anyone to see her like this.

“Hey, Mari-*UUURRRPPPP!*”

Marinette would’ve recognized that tone anywhere, but the eructation further solidified her assumption. She turned to see her best friend, Alya Césaire, who was now only ten pounds lighter than Marinette, waddling her way over to the same table. Marinette heaved her cushioned booty up off of the seat and gripped the tech-savvy girl in a soft hug. Alya sank a bit into Marinette’s slightly larger frame, but she greatly enjoyed the feeling. The amiable embrace also had the effect of pressing out some pent up gas from Alya’s hindquarters.

~*FFFRRRRRRTTT!*~

Though the fart had little in the way of smell, barely registering to Marinette’s now heightened senses of smell and taste, but it was powerful enough to ripple the fat on the blogger’s butt. Marinette would’ve given that one a ‘five’, maybe a ‘six’ just because of their friendship.

“Something wrong?” Marinette asked. “Usually, you’re the only one who can give me a run for my money when it comes to gas.”

“Sorry, but I haven’t eaten in 30 minutes, so my gas isn’t what I’d like it to be.” Alya deadpanned with a smirk.

Ever since the slobbification of Paris, Marinette and Alya’s relationship had changed somewhat. While they were still as close as sisters, they had gained a bit of a competitive streak regarding their new slovenly nature. While Marinette had undisputed sovereignty in all things slob, her best friend was a worthy opponent, having come close but never succeeding in dethroning her. The determination to win and general disgusting actions were just two other things that they respected about each other.

“Anyway, I’ve been thinking of challenging you again.” Alya requested, making Marinette roll her eyes playfully.

“Really? Haven’t the previous ten losses clued you in on how this will end?”

Alya’s smirk just grew. “I think I have a better chance of beating you, but I think we should a judge for this.”

“~*BBBBEEEELLLCCHH!*~ Why?” Marinette inquired after nonchalantly letting out an explosive belch.

“Well, a fair and impartial judge wouldn’t have any bias toward us. We’d be more even if someone could evaluate us without letting their personal interests get in the way.”

“That’s a… pretty reasonable argument.” Marinette conceded. “Alright, so who do you suggest?”

“Hmm,” Alya mused, her left index finger tapping the top of her three chins. “I was thinking of Adiren.”

“Pfft,” Mari scoffed. “Why would you drag that string bean into this? He doesn’t know the first thing about being a slob.”

“Because we could use an outsider’s perspective on this. He neutral to all of this, so he’s likelier to not fudge any scores.” Alya countered. “Besides, it's not his fault that his tight-ass dad’s got him on a strict…” She paused for dramatic effect. “diet and exercise plan…”

Marinette felt a desire to vomit at the mere mention of such blasphemous words. Adrien and his father were some of the few Parisians who were not caught up in what those neat freaks called ‘the Slobpocalypse’, and none of those who were could comprehend why they would forsake such a pleasant lifestyle. In Marinette’s opinion, blondie could stand to put some meat on his bones. As for his modeling career, he could always upgrade to plus-sizes. Demand for more Big Beautiful Men had spiked recently.

"So, what's your choice?" Alya questioned.
14132121.title: A Friendly Competitor.

141321211.content:
With a defeated sigh, Marinette agreed to the idea. Alya approached Adrien and asked him to judge their contest. At first, Adrien was confused by this request, but eventually agreed. Marinette didn’t even try to hide her scowl as the scrawny lad walked up to her, waving his right hand. In response, he received a raunchy burp to the face. As Adrien was recovering from the fumes, Alya gave her best friend a glare. This made Marinette groan and mumble a ‘sorry’ under her breath. Alya rolled her eyes at this blatantly half-assed apology, but sighed as she knew that this was the best she was going to get. However, being the courteous gentleman that he was, Adrien accepted it and questioned how they were doing this.

“Well, Marinette and I are going to pig out on the food at that table,” Alya explained, pointing to the table that Marinette was originally going to sit at. “But we’ll hold in all of our gas for the belching and farting contests.”

Adrien’s eyes widened a bit after hearing this, and Marinette picked up on this but remained silent.

“So, how do I help here?” He asked.

“We need you to count up how much food is there and split it so we have an equal amount of food to eat. Whoever eats over half of the food wins. I brought a scale for Marinette and I to weigh ourselves with before and after eating.”

Alya reached her left hand in a bag and pulled out a very large flat scale. She placed it on the floor and stepped on it, watching the number on the screen climb up to 250 lbs. Marinette went next and watched as her weight clocked out at 260 lbs. Adrien recorded these measurements and took a census on the various delicacies resting on the table. The tally added up to: 10 family-sized circular pizzas topped with pepperoni and sausage, two 1-gallon tubs of neopoliton ice cream, two half-vanilla and half-chocolate square cakes, eight pies of the apple, pumpkin, blueberry and cherry variety, 16 qudruple-patty cheeseburgers, 20 hotdogs with ketchup and mustard, four 2-litre bottles of soda, six foot-long sub sandwiches filled with ham, cheese and mayonnaise, and two whole turkeys. The two slobs were practically drooling at the sight of such a beautiful spread. Both took a seat at opposite ends of the table, a line of white chalk separating their respective quarries. Adrien rested his rear in a chair perpendicular to the table, with Marinette in his left field of vision and Alya in his right.

“May the better girl win.” Alya stated.

“Thanks, I plan to.” Mari replied with a smirk.

Alya returned the smirk, “Your modesty knows no bounds.”

A ring of Adrien’s phone signaled the start of the feast. Both girls began strong, each shoveling food down their gullets. Utensils were an unessesary tool here, even for the foods that they would normally be used for. Case in point, Alya was attacking the cake using her bare hands with the ferocity of a wild animal, smearing chocolate and vanilla frosting all over her face. She moaned in pleasure, wishing that she could savor her meal, but being on the clock meant that had to forgo taste to secure victory. Oh well, finally besting her best friend would be satisfying all on its own. Meanwhile, Marinette was devouring the pyramid of hotdogs, splattering crimson and gold condements on her white t-shirt and dark gray blazer as the wheat-enclosed frankfurters were swallowed whole. In a matter of a minute tops, the once towering structure had been reduced to scattered crumbs. Next, the Chinese-French girl targeted the soda, unscrewing the cap and hoisting it upside down at a 90° angle. The carbonated ebony nectar flooded into her mouth, some of it overflowing and dripping from her cheeks into her cleavage.

Adrien’s jaw was hanging down, the rich boy utterly shocked at the level of gluttony that transpired before him. Since the recent slob trend swept Paris, Adrien’s exposure to the outside was limited to an even greater extent, courtesy of his father. It was a wonder that Gaberiel still even let his son attend a public school. He had never experienced what a slob was capable of, especially Marinette, who seemed to be repulsed by him for some reason. His eyes widened even further than before, especially after seeing Marinette’s milk cannons be douced by soda. A weird sensation began to take hold, one that sweet innocent Adrien was unfamiliar with, but at the same time felt was somewhat pleasing. In his lower bodily area, a bulge started to form, one that manage to catch Marinette’s eyes for a few precious seconds. The two stared at each other and she could see his excited state. Both blushed heavily, Adrien looking down at the floor and Mari refocusing on her breakfast.

Alya was unaware of what just happened, as she was preoccupied with shoving her second sub down her throat. Her jaw rehinged with a snap once she was finished, and she proceeded to repeat the process on the third one. While this was going on, Marinette was rolling up a pizza like a burrito and cramming it whole hog past her lips. Her stomach was beginning to cramp up a bit from all of the food filling it up. Normally, she’d easily remedy this with a beastly belch or ferocious fart, but per the rules of the contest, she had to endure the gradually increasing discomfort. Still, at least her clothes were still relatively intact, albeit smothered in stains and stretched to accomidate her growing body, which was more than what could be said for Alya’s attire. Four of the blogger’s five buttons on her white-orange-and-purple-striped plaid shirt had already popped off, leaving the top one remaining to hold in her white tank top. She could not dwell on her fashion debacle at the moment, being kept busy by the current consumption of those scrumptious burgers. The gooey cheese oozed out from between the meat and splashed on the bare parts of her belly.

Marinete was now demolishing her pumpkin pie, her face buried in the filling like a pig in slop. She had already anniahaled the apple and blueberry ones and would soon seek out the cherry. Her only regret was not thinking to bring whipped cream for this. As Marinette was engulfing the pastery, Alya was grabbing the ice cream, which at this point had melted a little bit. The girl paid no heed to it and tilted the semi-fluid dairy product into her mouth. The multi-colored dessert expanded her belly as it entered through the stomach valve, pushing Alya’s abdomen against the table. Marinette was experiencing a similar feeling as she was now jamming her lukewarm turkey through her gums. Her jaws unhinged like Alya’s and quickly rehinged after the bones were inside her mouth.

--

By now, a crowd of the school’s student body had gathered around the table, watching in awe as the two titans ended their epic eating competition. Adrien could see that, while many of the students had become slobs, the girls were all larger than the boys. Another effect of ‘the Slobpocalypse’, as his father and many others not caught up in it called it, was that the female population took to it more than the male. Adrien had a theory that this was because many women were secretly like this, but couldn’t practice the behavior in public until recently, but it had yet to be proven. Marinette and Alya had finally completed the first part of their competiton, and both were absolutely stuffed. Each of their bellies contained 30% liquids, 30% solids and 40% gases, and they were eager to let out that 40%. Both stepped back on the scale and were surprised by the result.

“What?! How could you be one pound heavier?!” She shouted.

The audience let out a collective gasp at this. The thught of anyone outeating Marinette was unthinkable, but appearently Alya had finally succeeded.

“I’m sorry, but Alya’s new weight of 271 is 21 pounds heavier than her old weight, but your new weight of 280 is only 20 pounds heavier, so she techniacally wins.” Adrien exposited.

“B-But how did you do it? We ate the same amount!”

“Actually, I managed to fit in one of your subs. I’m surprised that you didn’t notice.” Alya answered.

Marinette thought back to what she said and went pale at what that meant. Alya was about to question it, but Marinette whispered the answer to her. Alya blushed a deep ruby at the news, but then giggled mischeviously.

“Marinette, I think he might have a thing for ladies like us.” Alya said.

Mari pondered the possibilities of this before flashing a grin. “Don’t be ridiculous, Alya. We’re definitely not ladies.”

The two got a got laugh out of that and turned to Adrien.

“So, Adrien, do you want to judge the gas from the front or the back first?” Marinette inquired cheekily.

The blonde blushed again, but answered…

"Beat that, Ayla!" Ayla responded by sucking in and shaking her big belly in an attempt to stir up gas. This resulted in a belch that was nearly as big as her friend's and gave her a confidence boost. Marinette wasn't done however and the bout continued until...
1413212111.title: Belch-off!

choices: Alya, the underdog, cuts a big one and takes another win!
Marinette blows away her competitor and proves her dominance once again!
14132121111.content:
For 20 straight minutes, Marinette and Alya bust out boisterous belches in Adrien’s face. The blonde model’s cheeks turned green with nausea, his stomach threatening to void its contents from out the mouth if this went on for too much longer. His once well-kept golden locks were now a disheveled yellow mop, the result of being exposed to constant gassy gales from the two slobs. He was beginning to regret agreeing to this. Although, he found himself getting very turned on by the girls’ barrage of burps, much to his embarrassment. The boy could only hope that no one noticed.

However, both Marinette and Alya knew that Adrien was enjoying this, even if just a little bit. They were not ones to disappoint, as their enormous eructations echoed throughout the cafeteria, causing everyone watching their match to flinch in fear. Even the teacher was gawking at them, deciding to postpone class until the contest ended out of respect for the school’s two top students. The belching besties were nearly dead even. Try as she might, Alya was just marginally inferior to her friend, but she felt like that infinitesimal gap was shrinking as the competition dragged out and could only hope that the situation would reverse before their gas reserves got too low. Gotta save some for the backside, after all.

“You’ve been doing better than before, Alya.” Marinette complimented while facing Adrien, before release another blast of gas that made her lips flap. “I might actually be in trouble.”

Alya took her place and pushed out a slightly weaker, but slightly longer belch. “Well, I’ve been training my ass off after all our other challenges, so I’m glad to see some results.”

Marinette resumed her original position and smirked. “Still though, you’re up against a master. *BBBBBBEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHH!*{ /c}” Marinette forced out a six-second-long burp that sent a sickly green fog at Adrien’s face. He could feel his nose hairs burn as the scent penetrated his nostrils and instinctively pinched them shut to keep it out.

“Come on, Adrien. I know that you like it.” Marinette teased, glancing at the rich boy’s southern extremities. Adrien followed her line of sight and blushed madly at what she was referring to. He tried to cover it with his legs, but the damage was done.

“Alright, Mari, stop torturing the poor boy,” Alya scolded. “I’m up next.”

Alya leaned forward until her face was only five inches from Adrien’s. His blush deepened, earning a giggle from both girls.

“Let’s see how you like this. *BBBBUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP !*” Without even sucking in air, a gargantuan belch erupts from the depths of Alya’s belly. It was two seconds longer than Marinette’s, but was a bit weaker. However, the smell was superior, as Adrien’s eyes were watering to the point where he could barely see and he was sent into a coughing fit.

Alya straightened her back and looked at her competitor. “Top that, Marinette.”

Even Marinette was impressed by that, which was not an easy feat to accomplish. She might have to break her own record to win this one. It was aggravating, but also exciting. Only Alya could make her feel like this. The fashion designer waddled up to her former crush, pushing out her bubbly belly in a successful attempt to intimidate him, and in a move that surprised him, Alya, and even herself a bit, she grabbed him and pulled the lighter, but still taller schoolmate into her flab. Adrien’s hormones were in overdrive, his recently revealed attraction to these two disgusting females was begging him to plant a smooch on the woman whose face was just three inches from his own. Said face, as well as hers and now Adrien’s clothes were smothered in sauces, soda, crumbs, and condiments, which would have repulsed anyone normal person. Then again, Adrien was not normal. Moved solely by his growing lust, he locked lips with his secret partner, stunning her. Alya’s jaw dropped as did everyone else’s. Marinette was feeling really weird right now, like a part of her should be enjoying this for some reason, but that’s not possible, right? Adrien’s so clean, orderly and well-mannered, directly clashing with Marinette’s wonderful lifestyle. There is no way that a relationship like that would work between such opposite personalities. She tried to fight it, but felt something poke her in the stomach.

Adrien’s lust had ascended to the point where he was completely erect, and he couldn’t care less right now. All that mattered was continuing the one-sided lovefest with the once timid girl. However, that sharp jutting shifted the pressure and gas housed within Marinette’s inflated abdomen. Much of that air was sent out ward, surging up her esophagus and out of her mouth.

“*HHHHHHHHHHHUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPP!*” Adrien’s cheeks bulged as Marinette’s climactic burp entered his own mouth. Even while muffled, the belch was by far the loudest one in the contest. It rang for nine seconds, carrying the smells of Marinette’s entire meal down Adrien’s throat. When the burpkiss ended, Adrien dropped back into his seat. He had to clasped his hands over his mouth to prevent himself from vomiting. The cafeteria was dead silent for a few minutes, until the judge of the contest broke it.

“Mariette wins…” He states weakly.

The Chinese-French girl squealed in delight, while Alya and the others were still slack-jawed. The blonde wanted to get to the farting, if only to get this over with faster. He prayed that their flatulence was less awful than their burping. Alya decided to go first, typically having better luck in this field, and pretty much shoved Adrien’s face into her fat ass. The gaseous maelstrom ruffled his hair, but it was relatively tame compared to her belching.

Marinette went next, but she lost a lot of gas after that mega burp, so she’s have to try extra hard to scrap together a win. Marinette subjects the white-clad student to the same treatment that Alya did and trumpeted a foul-smelling boom that was almost a match for Alya. This might take a while.

"Ridiculous, utterly, utterly ridiculous!" Came the typical whining of Paris's blonde spoiled brat. Chloe Bourgeois trudging down the hallways of Françoise Dupont Collège to the principal's office in a huff. It wasn't anything out of the ordinary, considering her track record for bullying and bad behaviour. Not that she would ever get expelled or anything. Whenever she had a problem her daddy the mayor would have it all solved for with the flick of a finger. It just the one who got sent to detention was what really ticked her off.

"Who does that MariBrat thinks she is? Telling others how to act?!" Chloe seethed. Marinette Dupain-Cheng was a constant pain in her butt ever since she first attended. Taking her front row spot in class, beating her at the student body election and stealing her precious Adrikins. If she was more like her and wasn't so caught up in caring about others lower than them, that wouldn't be a problem.

Chloe suddenly came to a halt at that very thought. Why not? Perhaps with a little makeover she could even be worthy of a friend, maybe even a sister. Now that was an idea. She had always wanted a sister when she was younger. An evil grin curled up on Chloe's face at this. Yes, my very own sister Marinette.

============================================================================ =====

"I'll catch up with you in a bit Alya, I just forgot something." Marinette told her friend before returning to Miss Busiter's class to grab her fashion sketchbook. She wasn't in the best of moods today. Chloe was to blame as usual for this. Sometimes she wondered why she even bothers with her. She idolises Ladybug but would hate her if she ever found out it was her.

But none the less, she knew it was important to not let your life as a civilian effect your actions as superhero. No matter who trailing it can be. Tikki's words sunk into her head. Grabbing her sketchbook she was about to leave when she noticed a small book on her desk. Cautiously opening up, she saw a beautiful golden amulet necklace in the shape of a bee.

Marinette was not sure who sent it. Perhaps it was Master Fu? Or maybe a close admirer? Maybe even Adrian? She blushed at the thought of this. Smiling she went to the bathroom to try it on. Tieing it around her neck, she turned to admir her reflection in the mirror. She looks good.

Unknownst to her, she began to change...

15511.content:
Marinette had a big heart and had experienced more bizarre things that she'd ever imagined since becoming Ladybug. It was because of this that when a sick fan of her's appeared on "the Challenge" and had to get into a belching contest with her, she was very willing despite the oddness of it. If anything, it was less embarrassing than dancing for Nino.

She had just finished her third soda for that afternoon and was ready to practice before she left for the studio. Marinette sucked in and..."BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP! What do you think, Tikki, was that belch a winner or what?"

"I guess so," Tikki shrugged as she floated around "but don't forget that this is to cheer up a sick kid. Don't get so caught up in winning." Marinette frowned slightly at this comment but nodded. "Off course. I just wanna make sure the kid has a good time. Gotta give it my best shot, you know? Okay, spots on!"

One transformation later, Ladybug was swinging towards KIDZ+ and was soon introduced to her challenger. Who was it?
15511.title: An odd Challenge

choices: Keep Going! The girl can't be that good, right?
Forfeit. There's... not as much shame in that.
155111.content:
Inside the TVi studio, the television network for children, KIDZ+, was currently being broadcast to a multitude of Parisian audiences, and they were going to get quite the show today. On that channel, the competition show, The Challenge, was underway and the contestant was standing in awe before her opponent.

“I can’t believe it. I’m actually meeting Ladybug!” She cheered, jumping excitedly.

The girl, 12 years of age, had red hair woven into a braid that reached her shoulders. She was clad in green shoes with white laces and a toe cap, pink shorts running down just past her kneecaps, and a solid yellow t-shirt with sleeves covering her elbows. Her build was lean, with her arms and legs lacking much muscle, but her height was only a few inches beneath her competitor. The girl’s irises were a vibrant blue that perfectly matched Ladybug’s and her pale skin was void of any freckles, blemishes, and the like.

“Hello, you must be Katie.” Ladybug stated, shaking the young girl’s hand. “Just know that whoever wins, we’re just here to have fun.”

“Yeah, sure.” Katie replied.

Ladybug took a few gulps of the air around her, making her stomach bloat out slightly under her skintight outfit. When she felt her belly reach its limit, the insect-themed superhero caved it in, forcing the oxygen mixed with stomach gas up her esophagus and out of her mouth.

~*BBBBBBEEEEEEEELLLLLLCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHH!*~

Ladybug went first, emitting a belch that surpassed the one that she’d let out at home. The burp lasted three seconds and carried a scent of sugary soda that wafted through the air, causing Katie to fan the odor away. It was also loud enough to make Katie flinch a little bit. LB smiled and gestured for Katie to go next, but was put off by the sick girl’s smirk.

The redhead copied her opponent’s technique, but took more controlled inhales, almost like she was performing from experience. When her tummy too had its fill of air, she did something a little different. Kat balled her right hand up into a fist and slammed it into her abdomen, throwing its interior into further chaos. Then, she lurched forward and let the anarchic air elevate through her chest and boom past her ruby lips.

~*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*~

If Ladybug’s burp was like a gale force wind, then Katherine’s was a tornado’s torrent. Her lips quivered from the force of it, her belch echoing throughout the set they were and causing the mystical super heroine to shield her eardrums. LB also had to pinch her nose shut as the young girl’s eructation brought a foul fog that quickly filled the set with the rank aroma of dissolved soda, pizza, burgers, and ice cream. Even the sheer power of Katie’s burp was not to be trifled with, as it possessed strength necessary to blow away Ladybug’s hair bands, causing her once pigtailed hair to correlate and flow in the wind, and even push her back several inches. The possibly demonic belch roared for around six seconds before finally dying, and in its wake was a giggling adolescent and a teenager who was wide-eyed in shock.

“Like you said, we’re just here to have fun.”

Ladybug simply stood there with her hair still in a blown-back shape, unsure about what just happened or what her next move was. Would she continue this contest to try and get an edge or concede victory to the sick girl and be spared any possible further humility?
155111.title: An Unexpected Turn.

1551111.content:
Regaining her composure, Ladybug laughed playfully. "Not bad kid, but I'm just getting warmed up!" Sucking in, she next unleashed: "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUURP!"

"Yeah?" Katie said in an equally teasing voice "well, so am I. BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP!"

LadyBug topped this and Katie topped her in return. On and on it went, proving the two were equally matched. Finally....

You would've actually beat me if we'd been given more time." LB blushed and was about to reply when someone shouted "NO, SHE WOULDN'T!" Who was it?

155111111.content:
Ladybug and Katie looked in the direction of the shout, seeing only the dual crimson doors that led outside the set. A second later, a deafening sonic belch came from behind them, knocking the doors off of their hinges. LB shielded the sick girl’s ears and jumped out of the way of the flying debris. The dust from the explosion dispersed, revealing a feminine figure sporting a purple body suit with pink gloves and boots that reached halfway up to her elbows and knees. A fluorescent red gem was embedded in her chest and a blue helmet with a clear glass visor covered her head. As she waltzed onto the set, the mysterious person paused to take a whiff of her belch, and then sighed contently like it was a fragrance from a fancy perfume.

“Who are you?” Ladybug questioned, trying to fan away the same odor.

“Sorry for interrupting, Ladybug.” The stranger replied, giving a small bow. “You may call me Eructa, and I am a huge fan of yours.”

“Under normal circumstances, I’d be flattered, but right now, I’d like to know why you’re here.” The teenager retorted, narrowing her eyes.

“I’m here to kill that sick brat standing next to you.”

“Why?” The mystical superheroine inquired, protectively pushing Katie behind her. “What did she ever do to you?”

“My, you’re quite full of questions. That little girl doesn’t deserve your attention! I’ve modeled my whole life after you, but some young punk managed to get a personal audience with you just like that.” Eructa ranted, finishing with a snap of her fingers.

“You’d kill a sick child just because you’re jealous of her?!” LB shouted, baffled.

“Yes. She’s probably not even sick. I’m the only one worthy of your presence, so move before I’m forced to hurt you!”

Katie turned to her hero, her eyes swelling with tears.

“Ladybug, if she wants me, then let me go.” The redhead said.

The red-and black clad heroine took a moment to look at the girl and softened her demeanor, then back at the villain, before regaining her steely resolve.

“No way!” Ladybug declared. “If you want her, Eructa, then you’ll have to get through me first!”

“Then so be it.” Eructa sighed before taking a deep breath. “~*BBBUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!*~”

Eructa had released another super belch, forcing Ladybug to take out her yo-yo and spin it in a circle, acting as a shield. However, while the eructation was unable to blow them away and the smell was deflected, the burp was still powerful enough to send Ladybug and Katie skidding several feet across the floor. The burp also rattled the walls and ceiling, causing chunks of dust and debris to rain down on everyone inside. The belch was reaching the 8- second mark and the magic crime-fighter’s had to use both arms just to keep the psychotic criminal’s gaseous emission at bay, and even then, they were starting to falter. Just when Ladybug’s defenses were about to fail…
155111111.title: Enter Eructa

"Okay Katie, how about this? Whoever beats this creep really wins!" Ladybug announced as she regained her composure. Katie looked unsure for a moment before a confident smirk crossed her features. Deal! Hey Gasbag!" Eructa turned towards her intended victim with a snarl. "That was weak! Let me show you how it's done."

The young girl proceeded to unleash a mighty belch that lasted twelve seconds, pushing the villainess back by several feet. Eructa looked dumbfounded for a moment before regaining her angry glare. Eructa scoffed. "I'm rather dissapointed Ladybug. You let a little girl fight your battles for you? Guess I won't feel bad about beating you after all. BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUURP!"

The Villain's burp was so mighty that it ruined Lb's hair for the second time that day. The heroine, however, was unphased. "Oh please! You call that a burp? This is a burp! BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCH_UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUU-BRAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP-ABCDEF GHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ_UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP!"

Ladybug seemed to combine every form of burp there was into a single grand erruction. Her foe would've litterally been blown away if the heroine hadn't lassoed the villain with her yo-yo. LB then "de-evilized" Eructa and undid all the damage done from the contest. "Looks like I win Katie. No hard feelings?"

Katie gleefully did so before turning it into a hug. "This was the best day ever! Can we hang out again sometime?" "Try and stop me." LB replied with a warm smile. "Great! You can meet my brother, Max. He wants to have a farting contest with you!"

choices: Find an Akumatized villain to test her newfound power on.
Invite Chat Noir for a sparring session to show just how much she has improved.
15521.content:
Lately, Marinette's life has gotten even more strenuous than usual. She's been easily winded just by her trips to and from school. By the time she does get to where she needs to go, the Chinese-French girl is normally found panting like a dog and sweating like a pig. Her cute ivory shirt even spawned smelly pit stains! Her twig arms felt as if they'd snap at any moment whenever the girl had to lug around mountains of schoolwork or tall orders for her family's business. Coupled with her naturally clumsy nature meant that this frequently led to dropping important assignments or baked goods and this in turn led to tripping and causing and even bigger mess. This physical ineptitude even affected her duties as Ladybug. At one point, she was capable of leaps, flips and jumps that would have quickly netted her world records and Olympic gold medals. Now, even with the additional power boost automatically granted to her when she transforms, she still lags far behind her catty partner, Chat Noir.

At the behest of her friends and family, Marinette had taken to a standard diet and exercise regimen to get back in shape. For once she regretted living a bakery, as it took an inhuman level of willpower to resist the heavenly aromas rising from her parents’ pastries. Her growling stomach soon became the loudest thing in the store, a testament to the great fasting that the benevolent girl was willingly subjecting herself to. Meals consisting of a banana in the morning, a small slab of meat with a protein shake for lunch, and a salad with a drop of dressing for dinner made up her daily food intake. Any pockets of flab that were stuck to her body melted off just from the lack of fat to consume. Her training was just as grueling, as she undertook any and every extracurricular that even remotely dealt with physical activity. Marinette ran 10-kilometer laps around the school, did push-ups even as her arms wobbled like jelly, and stretched to the point where she almost pulled her legs out of their sockets. Her new slew of responsibilities served to jumble up her ordinary schedule as a student, daughter, employee and super heroine. However, the teenager figured that if she were at peak bodily condition, then she’d be even stronger as Ladybug, so it as worth it to her. Whatever her rationale, Marinette would be hard-pressed to find a valid argument against the results after 6 months.

“Wow! My training’s really starting to pay off!”

The shy teen was analyzing her new frame in the mirror in her room. Originally, while her body was thin, it was also very lacking in noticeable muscles. Now, the combination of a low-calorie diet and hardened exercise had crafted it into a paragon of physical fitness. Her cardboard-flat stomach had developed rock-hard 6-pack abdominals. Marinette’s arms grew bulging veins and dominating biceps that threatened to cause tears in her clothing even when less contracted. Even her legs were well defined, having been rejuvenated by her constant running. All around Marinette thought that she had done some good work. She felt as though she could easily heave those worksheets and deliveries to where they’d need to go. And as LB, she could take down whatever supervillain crossed her path. This gave her an idea…
15521.title: Muscular Ladybug

155211.content:
Marinette knew finding a villain to pound on would not be easy. People only got Akumatized under special circumstances and she wasn't about to waste her power on petty criminals She almost, for a brief fleeting moment, considered bullying someone herself to create a villain but her own conscience wouldn't allow her to stoop so low.

What made things so frustrating was how slow things had gotten recently. No new villains had shown up in Paris for nearly two weeks! Even Chloe's bullying and general nastiness wasn't enough to cause a change! She'd normally have enjoyed this kind of break but the desire to test her new muscles was too strong to ignore.

As Marinette glumly pondered her situation in the cafeteria, she noticed some commotion over at a nearby table. Another student was challenging anyone brave enough to armwrestle them. Curious and in need of a distraction, Marinette decided to accept the challenge. Who's her opponent?
155211.title: No Villains Here

1552112.content:
Alix had her black-and-red sleeve pulled up over her right arm, smirking at how easily she’d defeated all prior competition. That jock, Kim was the first to go down, followed by Ivan, and even Nino and Adrien. No matter which hand she used, she was certain that victory would never abandon her. But that didn’t prevent her from being surprised when she heard who responded to her challenge next.

“I’ll take you on.” Marinette declared.

Alix, along with everyone else present at the cafeteria turned to see this. Marinette Dupain-Cheng, a rather feminine girl who concerned herself primarily with fashion designs, wanted to partake in a predominantly masculine activity? Alix chuckled a little at the absurdity of the situation.

“Alright, I’ll try to go easy on you.” The pinkhead taunted.

Marinette took a seat opposite to Alix, her own right arm having its sleeve lifted up from it, and gripped Alix’s hand, both of their arms bent at a 90° on the tan wooden table. On the count of 3, the match began, and the two contestants seemed to be on equal footing. That is, until Alix caught a faint twinkle in Marinette’s left eye. She recognized what it was for she too had that same twinkle, but that would mean that Marinette had an ace in the whole, which couldn’t be possible, right? Suddenly, Alix’s arm was starting to shake, a sign that her strength was wavering against her new adversary. The roller-blader’s pupil’s dilated as she hadn’t experienced a feeling like this before. The two arms were slowly descending, with Marinette’s arm being above Alix’s. Beads of sweat poured down her face as Alix gritted her teeth and pooled all of her power into that one appendage, but Marinette’s arm just wouldn’t budge. Eventually, Alix’s reserves of stamina had been depleted, and her arm collapsed under the pressure of Marinette’s. Alix’s blue eyes widened at what she just saw.

“What was that?!” She thought. “There's no way that just happened!”

Nobody had expected this outcome. Alix had just had her four-time winning streak broken… by Marinette, of all people! This was so embarrassing.

“Well, do you want to go again?” Marinette inquired innocently, but with the slightest hint of a smirk.

Alix nursed her right arm for a moment before answering, “Yeah, but the first time was just beginner’s luck.”

They locked hands together once again, but this time, Alix was willing to use both of hands to overcome Marinette. At the second count of three, Alix and Marinette were somewhat evenly matched, with Alix even thinking that she had gotten a narrow edge over the pigtailed teenager. However, that notion was swiftly shot down when Marinette’s hand tightened its grip on Alix’s two, causing the black-capped girl to let out a yelp of shock. It was then that Alix’s arms were beginning to buckle at the force of Marinette’s bulging biceps, making her scowl a bit at how much effort she had to put in just to stave of defeat. At least she was holding out longer than last time, as they’d already exceeded the 30 seconds that it had taken for Marinette to win before. With wobbling arms, Alix continued her attempt to hold off Marinette’s advancing arm, but the battle was gradually falling in favor of the Chinese-French girl. And she didn’t even seem to be trying that hard to boot! Finally, at the one minute mark, Alix had conceded success to her new opponent, out of desire to not have her arm be seriously injured. As Alix frowned in disappointment, she also took notice of how… large the blue-haired girl’s arm muscles were. Good God, how could she get that beefy without anyone noticing?!

“Is that it?” Marinette asked as her sly grin now clearly visible.

Her question was met with various responses from some of the other students, who figured that they might be able to wear her down by taking turns. They soon learned that this was definitely not the case, as Kim, Ivan and Nino were all subsequently served. Even when they and Alix teamed up and used both of their hands, Marinette was able to come out on top in a matter of 2 minutes, though she had to put in as much as a quarter of her strength to do so. The only point in which Marinette came remotely close to being toppled was when her crush, Adiren went against her. Oh, how she was unwilling to damage those perfect fair-skinned arms. But, in her fervor to find out how strong she was, those feelings of attractions were pushed back into the recesses of her mind and he was bested like his predecessors. Though, at least he assure her that it didn’t hurt, making her sigh in relief. Soon, their lunchtime had come to an end and the cafeteria was becoming less densely populated. Marinette’s opponents shook her hand, saying that there were no hard feelings, including Alix who stayed behind to talk to her.

“Marinette, I want to know how you got that strong.” She said.

“Well, I just dieted and exercised like people usually do, but for six months.” Marinette answered casually.

Alix’s eyes widened in shock once again. “How does someone get that strong in just six months?! She must have a secret or something!”

“I want to ask if you can train me.” Alix requested, folding her still sore arms in defiance of a potential ‘no’ to that answer. “If you can get that strong in six months, then I can get stronger in the same time.”

Marinette turned her eyes away from Alix, pondering her answer.
